abstract: Suspended Catholic clergyman Msgr Kevin Wallin is sentenced in Hartford to five and a half years in prison after apologizing for running methamphetamine distribution operation.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors said Msgr. Kevin Wallin had received meth in the mail, supplied a New York distributor and bought a sex video and toy shop to launder the proceeds.

headline.main: Monsignor Is Sentenced for Running a Meth Ring
headline.print_headline: Monsignor Is Sentenced for Running a Meth Ring

snippet: Prosecutors said Msgr. Kevin Wallin had received meth in the mail, supplied a New York distributor and bought a sex video and toy shop to launder the proceeds.
